description: Manages organizational directory data including companies, employees, departments, teams, and organizational hierarchy for the EDUCORE platform

field_descriptions.company_id: Unique UUID identifier for the company
field_descriptions.industry: Industry sector the company operates in
field_descriptions.hr_contact_name: Name of the HR contact person
field_descriptions.hr_contact_email: Email address of the HR contact
field_descriptions.kpis: Key Performance Indicators for the company
field_descriptions.logo_url: URL to the company logo image
field_descriptions.max_attempts: Maximum number of assessment attempts allowed
field_descriptions.exercises_limited: Whether exercises are limited in number
field_descriptions.employee_id: Unique UUID identifier for the employee
field_descriptions.employee_identifier: Employee ID from CSV (unique within company)
field_descriptions.email: Email address of the employee (unique across all companies)
field_descriptions.current_role_in_company: Current job role/title in the company
field_descriptions.target_role_in_company: Target/desired role the employee wants to achieve
field_descriptions.teams: Array of team objects the employee belongs to
field_descriptions.value_proposition: Employee value proposition generated from enrichment
field_descriptions.enrichment_completed: Whether profile enrichment has been completed
field_descriptions.department_id: Unique UUID identifier for the department
field_descriptions.department_identifier: Department ID from CSV (unique within company)
field_descriptions.team_id: Unique UUID identifier for the team
field_descriptions.team_identifier: Team ID from CSV (unique within company)
field_descriptions.created_at: Timestamp when the record was created
field_descriptions.updated_at: Timestamp when the record was last updated

company.kpis: Employee engagement, Learning completion rates, Skill development progress

employee.bio: Experienced software engineer with expertise in React and Node.js
employee.value_proposition: Strong problem-solving skills and ability to mentor junior developers

notes: The 'type' field indicates the entity type: 'company', 'employee', 'department', 'team', or 'organizational_summary'
Each entity type has different fields - not all fields are present in every record
Employees can have multiple roles (array of role types)
Employees can belong to multiple teams (array of team objects)
Company ID (company_id) maps to tenant_id in the Coordinator/RAG system
Employee roles include: REGULAR_EMPLOYEE, TRAINER, TEAM_MANAGER, DEPARTMENT_MANAGER, DECISION_MAKER
Department and team identifiers (department_identifier, team_identifier) are from CSV upload and unique within company
Employee identifier (employee_identifier) is from CSV upload and unique within company
All timestamps are in ISO 8601 format (UTC)
